hints.content:
$\green{5}7{,}270$ is composed of:  
$\green{5 \text{ ten thousands}} + 7 \text{ thousands} + 2\text{ hundreds} + 7\text{ tens}$.  

 We can use place value to express this in a different way.

$\green{5 \text{ ten thousands}}$ can be written as $\blue{4\text{ ten thousands} + 1\text{ ten thousand}}$.

So, $\green{5 \text{ ten thousands}} + 7\text{ thousands}$ can be regrouped this way:  

$\green{5 \text{ ten thousands}} + 7 \text{ thousands}$
$\begin{align}&=\blue{4\text{ ten thousands} + 1\text{ ten thousand}} + 7 \text{ thousands}\\
&= 4 \text{ ten thousands} + 10 \text{ thousands} + 7 \text{ thousands}\\
&= 4 \text{ ten thousands} + \purple{17} \text{ thousands}.
\end{align}$

The other digits will not change.

| | | | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-| :- | :-
$57{,}270$ | $=$ | $5\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$| $7\text{ thousands}$ | $+$| $2\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $7\text{ tens}$
$57{,}270$ | $=$ | $4\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$ | $\maroonD{17\text{ thousands}}$| $+$|  $2\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $7\text{ tens}$
